ygData.subject: Dark elf faction raising
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, i did what i did not want to do most, lose my dark elf faction! It isnt totally back to ready to attack but now its at threatening . I had to save a
ygData.messageBody:
Well, i did what i did not want to do most, lose my dark elf faction! It
isnt totally back to "ready to attack"
but now its at "threatening". I had to save a guildmember who was being
killed by the sergeant d'ocom...

So now i ask...what does everyone know about raising dark elf factions
back up? i cannot remember the exact names of factions that went down
when i killed the sergeant but i do know one was
indigo brotherhood - wich i think is the rogue guild.
i think two of them were darkguards, or darkguardians.

Killing all 3 halfling camps for a hour did not help either, all it
raised was "Unkempt druids" faction
i even killed a leaterfoot deputy and that didnt help a bit.

I really wish we had some more information on who to kill for wich
faction to raise, maybe there is a chart out there on the net.
Any info on how to raise Dark elf faction would be appreciated greatly

-rufane
tunare
